alert.note: Alert for Glasscock; Midland (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 03 at 3:46AM CDT until June 03 at 9:30AM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of western Texas, including the following counties, Glasscock and Midland. * WHEN...Until 545 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 344 AM CDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Up to 0.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Midland, Greenwood, Midland International Air and Space Port, Spraberry, Cotton Flat, Midland Airpark and Warfield.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
